author: sky.cactus
content: <@364458974906548225> I'm open to someone figuring out a way to define transactions such that they are reducible, though I suspect that such a solution will likely constrain what we can do.

author: sky.cactus
content: For example, in 2711, there is one nonce for the whole payload despite the payload including two signers and `n` transactions.

author: sky.cactus
content: Also, maybe in the future there will be a transaction type that doesn't have a nonce at all!
